content: this collaboration with ravelution yarn was inspired by fields of wildflowers in spring and summer colourful and delicate i hope these socks bring you joy knitalong anouncement #sockravelution2023 june 1-30 2023 ravelution yarn and myself are hosting a kal for this pattern and any of my other free sock patterns the kal is hosted on instagram and all the details for the event are pinned on our pages follow us @marieelysedugal and @ravelutionyarn for all the details this pattern is written for a cuff down pair of socks there are multiple variations included in the instructions 2 colour or single colour mid-calf or shortie pick your favourite and happy knitting yarn and notions yarn fingering weight sock set or one 100-110g skein 400-450 yards 2 colour mid-calf version main colour 40-75g 175-350 yards and contrast colour 20-25g 80-100 yards 2 colour mid-calf sample in wilflower sock set by ravelution yarn shortie sample in hey there dahlia by ravelution yarn needles 2 25mm i use needles with a long cable for magic loop or use your preferred needles such as 9 in circulars or dpns gauge 9 sts = 1 inch in stockinette nota bene special instructions for shortie socks are in blue at the end of the written instructions options for using a contrasting colour and doing the 2 rounds of petals colourwork will be noted in purple throughout the pattern
